title: 195. Q&AF: How DJ Got Hired, Asking For A Raise & Creating Value
itunes:title: 195. Q&AF: How DJ Got Hired, Asking For A Raise & Creating Value
description: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on how DJ was hired & became a part of the podcast, the best way to ask your boss for a raise, and how to respond when given additional responsibilities in your job.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on how DJ was hired & became a part of the podcast, the best way to ask your boss for a raise, and how to respond when given additional responsibilities in your job.
